WFAPI::POICategory

WFAPI::POICategory Class Reference

#include <POICategories.h>

Detailed Description

Class representing a POI category with possibility to enable or disable visibility.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

WFAPI::POICategory::POICategory ( const WFString &  catName,
wf_uint32  id,
bool  visible 
)

The constructor. Must be supplied with a name, a unique id and whether the category should be visible or not by default.

Parameters:
catName The name of the category.
id The id of the category.
visible True if the category should be visible by default.

The name of the category.

bool WFAPI::POICategory::isVisible (  )  const

Returns true if the category is visible, false otherwise.

void WFAPI::POICategory::setVisible ( bool  visible  ) 

Set to true if the category should be visible, false otherwise.
